long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your productivity and streamline your communication with Instant Phrase, the ultimate Chrome extension for quick access to your frequently used phrases, templates, and snippets.

Seamless Google Sheets Integration: Connect directly to your Google Sheets, turning them into a powerful, customizable phrase database.

Lightning-Fast Search: Instantly find the perfect phrase with our responsive search functionality.

One-Click Copy: Copy your selected phrase to the clipboard with a single click, ready to paste anywhere.

Smart Personalization: Automatically replaces placeholders like "First Name" with selected text from your current webpage.

User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive setup and easy navigation make managing your phrases a breeze.

Secure and Private: Your data stays in your Google Sheets, giving you full control and privacy.
